abstract: asus zenfone max plus coming to north america with big battery , face unlock .
article: the ces 2018 news continues today with a mobile announcement from asus . asus is launching the zenfone max plus in north america . the device will arrive in february at a price of $ 229 , which will get you a phone with 3 gb of ram and 32 gb of storage . buyers will have two color options to choose from : azure silver and deepsea black . the asus zenfone max plus features a 5.65-inch 2160x1080 display with 18:9 aspect ratio . there 's a 16-megapixel front camera with f/2 .0 aperture for all your selfie needs , and around back there 's a dual camera setup that includes a 16-megapixel main sensor with an f/2 .0 aperture and phase detection autofocus as well as a secondary 8-megapixel sensor with a 120-degree wide angle lens .

inside the zenfone max plus 's metal chassis is an octa-core mediatek mt6750t processor and a 4,130 mah battery . asus has also included a rear fingerprint reader with the zenfone max plus as well as a face unlock feature to help you unlock your phone when you 're unable to use the fingerprint sensor . this is the first zenfone device with face unlock . asus has loaded the zenfone max plus with android 7.0 running below a custom zen ui 4.0 user interface . asus .
